20110128175450.000|20110128175450.000|CC1| One out of two regular smokers 
20110128175450.000|20110128175450.000|CC1|   will die prematurely from    
20110128175450.000|20110128175455.000|CC1|           smoking.             
20110128175455.000|20110128175455.000|CC1|  You don't have to be one of   
20110128175455.000|20110128175459.000|CC1|             them.              
20110128175459.000|20110128175501.000|CC1|        Escape the trap.        
20110128175501.000|20110128175504.000|CC1|         Say "Enough."
